name: Penguin Dash (PhilipU)
description:
A penguin themed endless runner game made using the Stencyl engine.

Notes

  • Only endless mode is functional
  • We advise to use the "W" and "S" keys to move because the browser window may scroll up and down if the player uses the "up" and "down" arrow key

Instructions

  1. Press "W", space bar, or "up" arrow key to jump (you can jump twice)
  2. Press "S" or "down" arrow key to slide (for fun)
  3. Press "Esc" to pause the game during endless mode

Links

  • GitHub repository: https://github.com/PhilipU21/Penguin-Dash
  • Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document
